page.title: 02A VILLAGER MR JOHN KNIGHT
page.content: {MR JOHN KNIGHT}came to the village when he was 6 weeks old in 1923. He started school in September 1927. When he was at school he lived at 1 The Green .When he left school he went into the army, he was called up when he was 19. When he was at school there were 117 pupils, the hall was two classrooms separated by sliding doors. Mr Knight's pocket money was 6d. The Turville Memorial Hall was a reading room.Half the books were borrowed from the library, the other half belonged to the village.Now Mr Knight has retired from teaching, he takes us at school for cricket. He is also the chairman of the football team.
